name: HeroVersus GO
description:
HeroVersus is a eSport fighting game for mobile with real online PVP，and no pay to win. HeroVersus strive to provide you the real fighting game experience!

The Story of HeroVersus is set in an alternative universe during the World War II era
and is told via a comic series consisting of over 100 pages of narrative content, viewable directly within the game, delivered episodically and unlocks as the player progresses through the game by collecting comic segments.

Join us in HeroVersus Beta and find out more
